post.body: if you read my @reply from twitter regarding sending you custom "decal" w/ your son's name, that would be ok for me to do then?
Thx for the follow - Love your twitter background!
do you check your @ replies on Twitter or just FriendFeed instead?
want an extra teenager? I have a couple, I could spare one...
I was thinking of sending you one of my custom "stickers" of your son's name to put in his room..... good idea?
I nominate @Scobleizer for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia because he is in the KNOW in Social Media!
I nominate @Scobleizer for a Shorty Award in #tech because he delivers the BEST in tech news.
I also just updated my Bio to better reflect who I am & reach other like-minded people (I happened to stumble accross you)...
I nominate @FrustrationMan for a Shorty Award in #humor because his bio and location is HALARIOUS!
thank you for the friendorfollow link. I related to what you were saying and I'm going through and cleaning things up myself!
the writer of the twitter all-star article has 36 followers?
do you have an app or process to sort through your followers?
Hi- I'm an AF vet, learning & working in social media. If you'd like to follow back, I can DM you some very helpful tips.
I saw your post on Women 2.0 LinkedIn Group about twitter topic - stopping by to say Hi!
I nominate @thenonprofitorg for a Shorty Award in #nonprofits because it's doing something that has never been done before
LOL - It always takes me longer!
I have you all sorted aside on friendfeed so I don't miss anything...
@MomPink @ToThink @bizziemommy @vintagebodyspa @coolphotoideas @boutiquecafe - Welcome Inner Circle Members
Hello - It's me Jannifer from the were you part of @JessicaKnows Inner Circle? - I'd like to connect.
Hello - It's me Jannifer from the @JessicaKnows Inner Circle - just added you
Hello - It's me Jannifer from the @JessicaKnows Inner Circle - just added you.
It's me Jannifer from the Inner Circle - I added you... replying to you from FriendFeed.
Hi - It's me Jannifer from Inner Circle. I added you...
did you see or get my msg. from FriendFeed?
Loved the Inner Circle too! - you're the best!... (replying to you from over here in FriendFeed... ;-)
know what you mean - trying to make it happen - hope it's not too late (cancer is growing a lightening speed)
it's $500-600 for the treatment, but when you're barely getting by, it's like thousands
yes, it's the only real chance, but it still may be too late.
thank you for your kindness
I know - I may create my own too
Found you on FriendFeed - I'm thinking of creating a scrapbooking / creative room - good idea?
Do you use FriendFeed? Then I want to connect with you! - http://friendfeed.com/wordsforliving
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal. ~Henry Ford
Welcome new followers! Pls check out my updated Bio - I could be creepy or have a startling job description.. might want to check that out!
5-Star Outrageous Chocolate Cookies! - http://tinyurl.com/629kzo
RT @MilitaryMama: Please follow/Retweet to show support for military branches: @USArmy, @AFPAA (Air Force), @mynavymyfuture, @USMC, @USCG
Cookie recipe - Chocolate-Espresso Snowcaps. These cookies look like little snow-covered mountains! Yummy Coffee flavor! http://ow.ly/GG
Finding & following FriendFeed fans...
If fate means you to lose, give him a good fight anyhow. ~William McFee
I'm catching up with things.. DM me if you need anything...
Hospitality is making your guests feel at home, even if you wish they were.
SALE-Join UL® for $149—that’s $100 OFF the reg. price! PLUS $100 FREE product credit-like joining for only $50! http://ow.ly/mq
Need EXTRA INCOME? I CAN HELP YOU! Perfect biz for WAHM Moms, Decorators, Crafters, Scrapbookers, Creative people, etc.
I'm looking for Moms, etc. to join my team - can you help me find them? - http://jes.uppercaseliving.net/JoinMyTeam.m Start-Up SALE
Are you on TwitterMoms? I'd love to connect! - http://www.twittermoms.com/profile/wordsforliving
DIY - you can EASILY apply CUSTOM Names, Quotes, etc., to walls WITHOUT painting or stenciling?? http://jes.uppercaseliving.net/Home.m
Never let a computer know you're in a hurry. ~Author Unknown
RT @natalie_brown: @wordsforliving have u read this http://is.gd/dUml <--- that's the treatment; I'm bookmarking that site as well thanks!
Because I've lived a life of extreme and massive loss over the past 5 years. I don't want to lost him too.
I can't handle this loss. He's my baby and the rare bright joy I have in my life...
I talked to the Dr. who created Neoplasene this afternoon. He gave me a 100+ page reading assignment + I have to find a vet to administer it
Thanks for all of your caring. @natalie_brown - the alternative treatment is Neoplasene
*cries*
I'm CRUSHED - he's my baby! I have to try to save him!
Here is a head shot of my doggie - http://tinyurl.com/92vlfz
Then I called this Dr. in Montana - I have to find a vet here; the treatment for Lymphoma is $500-500; I can't see through my tears + panic
Then I talked to someone on Facebook who'd found an alternative treatment - Neoplasene - then I called that Dr.
I tried to get my dog in for Chemo treatment tomorrow, but they won't take him because he's too sick! (they've given up)
Thank you all, I'm just devistated. I found an alternative treatment, but don't know if I can finance it,
OMG - I may be too late to save my doggie with Lymphoma cancer - I may have a last chance alternative, but don't think could afford it! :-(
